info.title: Briickout
info.author: BHSPitMonkey
info.details:
Break the bricks!

Functionality is very basic right now. No power-ups yet, infinite lives.

Controls:

Hold remote sideways to play.
(D-pad) Move
(2) Spawn a new ball
(+) Pause
(Home) Exit to loader

Changelog:

Version 0.2:
 - Sexy new graphics
 - Visual ball spin effect
 - Pause functionality
 - Ball waits for user input before appearing
 - Code cleanup
 
Version 0.1:
 - Initial release
